title: SOLD: T3 Pfeister, Cubs (very poor, very cheap)
author: Rob D.

posts.post_title: SOLD: T3 Pfeister, Cubs (very poor, very cheap)
posts.post_content:
T3 has seen better days and likely has suffered water damage because the back is starting to separate. The good news is that some of Net54's creative sellers could hope the back fully separates, wonder whether the card is a proof or scrap, start a thread on the main board, wait three days (or less than 24 hours), then list it here and take offers. But that's up to you.

$xxx delivered within the United States. PayPal is fine. No need to "gift" your payment.

A commitment to buy takes precedence over an ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]Feel free to email any questions.[/URL]

Thanks,

Rob

[URL="wolfie51sb@aol.com"]wolfie51sb at aol.com[/URL]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/pfeister.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/ineedanap/otherphotos/t3back.jpg[/IMG]
Never owned a T3.  I'll take it.  email sent.

[quote name="Anthony S." post=1120562]Never owned a T3.  I'll take it.  email sent.[/QUOTE]

Thanks. By the way, have you ever owned a few thousand poor-very good 1950s commons?
